item.title: Malware reporter skype bot
item.description: Company: vk 2014-02 — 2015-09 From scratch implemented a Skype bot which reports phishing and malware websites to security organizations (like Phishtank) and to the web hosters.

item.title: MGT - IP location tool
item.description: Company: vk 2013-01 — 2015-07 Implemented a windows WPF IP location tool based on Quova geo API. The application shows multiple IP’s geo information.
